data.actual_result: The Drag n Drop dialogue appears, but then disappears when file is dropped.
data.expected_result: The upload dialogue appears, and the image can be uploaded.
data.short_description: When drag and dropping images from chrome's download bar, the image doesn't upload.
data.steps_to_repro: - Download an image from the internet. - Drag the file from the download bar into Discords window.
